action.action-desc: Mr. Rose introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Financial Services

form.official-title: To clarify that an issuer may exclude a shareholder proposal pursuant to section 240.14a–8(i) of title 17, Code of Federal Regulations, without regard to whether such proposal relates to a significant social policy issue.

section.header: Exclusions available regardless of significant social policy issue
section.text: An issuer may exclude a shareholder proposal pursuant to section 240.14a–8(i) of title 17, Code of Federal Regulations, without regard to whether such shareholder proposal relates to a significant social policy issue.
